RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKY PANTS broke out at the start, showed speed and led early then tracked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two to three path on the turn, gained to take the advantage into upper stretch and drew clear under steady urging. NEW YORK STRONG settled on the outside, was roused three to four wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and narrowly earned the place while no match for the winner. WAR STRIDE moved up to get the lead then showed the way, vied inside on the turn, lost the lead into upper stretch and weakened then was caught for the place while well clear for the show. TREBLE CLEF bumped with a rival at the start, angled out under urging early then was coaxed along off the pace, went three wide on the turn and was no factor. PARTY WITH SMARTY moved in while settling off the pace, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond. MOON FROLIC bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along at the rear, raced inside to the two path on the turn, suffered an injury to his right-hind leg nearing the sixteenth-pole and was pulled up then vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Frolic
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,settled at rear,ins-2p turn,injured 1/16,vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: New York Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,roused 3-4path turn,no match,up for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Outer turf CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONA L CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare As sessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KERRY chased just off the inside just off the pace down the backstretch, tucked inside through the turn, cut the corner into upper stretch, paused in behind the leader GET THE CANDY until roused getting clearance just outside the eighth pole, rallied up the rail to take command inside that station, dug in gamely to prevail at the end. MASTEROF THE TUNES two to three wide in pursuit, got set down angled five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on willingly but missed at the end. IM JUST KIDDIN chased three then two wide, got let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to the finish to secure the show honors. ITSAKEYPER chased along the inside, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and was behind rivals on pause, tipped out three then four wide and was unable to go further with THEODORA GRACE to her outside and IM JUST KIDDIN directly in front, could do nothing but await a seam, got one finally seventy yards from the finish and was placed to urging and improved position to secure the last major share. THEODORA GRACE broke out at the start, chased four then briefly three wide before tipping back to the four path five-sixteenths from home, continued four wide into upper stretch and was set down at that juncture, dug in under a drive keeping on but was outfinished in the late stages. GET THE CANDY established the front shortly after the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under challenge to the outside and was placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat from a host of challengers and was headed for command inside the eighth pole, then weakened in the late going. FONTANAFREDDA broke out at the start and was corrected, raced three wide in aim of the front before advancing to press the leader from the outside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Itsakeyper
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins, 2w 1/4 beh foes, tip 3-4w 1/8, beh foes 70yds, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Get the Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, headed ins 1/8, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Kerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, ins turn, cut corner paused, up ins 1/8, dug in, game

ENTRY.NAME: Fontanafredda
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 3w in aim, pressed 3w turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Masterof the Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, set down 5w upper, dug in, willingly, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Im Just Kiddin
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, let out 3w upper, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Theodora Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, set down 4w upper, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPT IONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Prefer red)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MESSIDOR (IRE) went around the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, shifted from the rail to the three path while moving closer on the far turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, closed well to get the lead near the eighth-pole, dueled with the runner-up in the final furlong and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. ADAAY IN ASIA (GB) had her head turned at the start and was off a step slow, saved ground on the opening bend, settled off the pace, moved closer in the two path on the far turn, rallied in the four path into the stretch, made a bid inside of the winner around the three-sixteenths, dueled inside that foe in the final furlong and was denied while able to get the place. FAVOR was taken in hand early, rounded the first turn in the two path, was well placed just off the pace, saved ground on the far turn, chased behind the pacesetter in upper stretch, moved out at the furlong marker and safely secured the show while unable to reach the top two. TRAFFIC SONG was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, raced in the three path on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the far turn, dropped back under a drive in upper stretch and tired. OK HONEY angled in at the rear, saved ground on the turns, moved out in upper stretch and was no factor. FAITH IN HUMANITY (FR) went to the front then was taken under a tight hold, showed the way on the inside, was held together into the stretch, lost the advantage outside the furlong marker and faltered then was eased late.

ENTRY.NAME: Traffic Song
ENTRY.OWNER: Burning Daylight Farms Inc and Galbraith Rebecca

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in at rear, saved ground, moved out 3/16, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RINGY DINGY three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung four then three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged away under a drive to prevail. VALUE AREA stumbled at the start recovering inwards and bumping ALTHENA, raced three to four wide in aim of the front, advanced to take command three furlongs from home, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, ran on to chase the winner home preserving the place honors safely over a rival on the wire. CATHERINE WHEEL coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. MARTINGALE chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. MATAGORA BAY showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, got headed for the front at the three-eighths and came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. MONTEGO BAY coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide for home, tired. ALTHENA got bumped at the start by VALUE AREA, who recovered outwards from a stumbled, chased three then two wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. WAKE UP LAUREN got coaxed along early when devoid of speed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing once more midway on the turn, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Martingale
ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H and Schermerhorn Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, angled 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Catherine Wheel
ENTRY.OWNER: Schermerhorn Richard Team Hanley Thirty Year Farm Hill 'n' Dale Equine Holdings
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 4-5w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Montego Bay
ENTRY.OWNER: Alexander Helen C and Armstrong Catharine C
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Matagora Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, headed 3/8, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ringy Dingy
ENTRY.OWNER: Callahan Peter J and McDonald James Reiley
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 4-3w upper, up 1/8p, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Althena
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Value Area
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Lewin Gary F
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, 3-4w in aim, up 3/8, 3-2w upper, collared, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: B D SAINTS was hustled from the gate, dropped from the three path to the two path while going to the front early on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action in the two path on the far turn, extended the advantage when set down in upper stretch, drew off under a drive to the sixteenth-pole then was eased up while much the best. EZ ROLL went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside but with some cover, was urged four wide on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. ERIC FROM MIAMI broke in at the start, raced inside to the two path on the first turn, bumped with a rival late on that bend, was reserved near the back, saved ground behind horses early on the far turn then was roused near the three-eighths, shifted three wide into the stretch then angled further out, came between horses into the final furlong and got up for the show. VIN SANTO broke near the back of the field, went three to four wide on the first turn, settled outside without the benefit of the cover, moved from three to five wide on the far turn, bumped with a rival outside the five-sixteenths, came seven wide into upper stretch, brushed with a foe near the sixteenth-pole and just missed the show while able to get the last spot in the superfecta. DUNEDIN CAUSEWAY was last to commence, went two to three wide on the first turn, bumped with a rival late on that bend, was reserved near the back, moved from the two path to the four path on the far turn, bumped with an opponent outside the five-sixteenths, bumped with another foe while coming six wide into upper stretch, raced between horses into the final furlong, brushed with an opponent around the sixteenth-pole and just missed the superfecta. BENZODINI dropped from the five path to the three path on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the far turn, chased into upper stretch and tired. FROZEN FOUR was taken in hand early, saved ground while reserved under a snug hold, moved closer midway down the backstretch, shifted to the two path late on the far turn, was roused three wide into the stretch then moved further out and lacked the needed response. CHARGING FAST traveled around the opening bend in the two path, settled near the middle of the field, went two then three wide on the far turn, bumped with a rival while five wide into upper stretch, raced between horses into the final furlong and failed to rally. DILLON was well placed in the second flight while hugging the rail, took an awkward stride late on the far turn, chased inside in the stretch and came up empty. A KNIGHT'S COURAGE went four then three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, raced between horses in the two path on the far turn, was asked at the quarter-pole and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: A Knight's Courage
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Benzodini
ENTRY.OWNER: Bell Richard A and Bell John M

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 93. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUALITY G got bumped and bounced around between foes after the start when CARLIN CLAN placed a trio in tight briefly tucking over from the outside before tipping back out to relieve it, settled just off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, made steady progress to be just off the pace when placed to coaxing near the quarter pole before being set down angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong from home, inched away under a drive to prevail. EXTREME ACCESS tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive offering up a bid a furlong out, ran on to chase the winner home willingly for the place honors. MIRACLE MIKE saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing tipped just off the inside at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, closed well to procure the show honors. WILLINTORISKITALL coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and continued in the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then weakened in the late stages. KINGFISH STEVENS showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, then weakened in the late going. FRONT MAN chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, made no late headway. BRICCO saved ground near the rear of the field, came under encouragement with five-sixteenths to go, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. LORD GATLING chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. MISTER ABARRIO just off the inside tracking from just off the pace, came under coaxing with five-sixteenths remaining, angled four to five wide for home and weakened in the stretch. CARLIN CLAN tucked in briefly after the start placing MISTER ABARRIO, QUALITY G, and WILLINTORISKITALL in tight to his inside forcing those rivals to jostle briefly for two paths before tipping back out to relieve the pressure, raced three wide into the first turn, tracked the pace just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide for home and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Extreme Access
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, dug in, ran on, willing

ENTRY.NAME: Bricco
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, coaxed 2p 5/16, angled 4w uppr, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Kingfish Stevens
ENTRY.OWNER: Hammer Time Stable SOK Racing and Lentini Maria L
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Willintoriskitall
ENTRY.OWNER: Hardoon Joseph R and Messina George
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins near 1/4 ins 1/4, bid, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Quality G
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw after st, chased 2p, 5w uppr, up 1/8, inched away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Abarrio
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Carney Christopher L and Casal Jorge

ENTRY.NAME: Carlin Clan
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and John Grossi's Racing Corp
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w into 1st turn, tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Mike
ENTRY.OWNER: Franklin Ave Equine LLC and International Equine
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 2p 5/16, 7w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Front Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, no late headway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOVING PICTURES was hustled from the start, established a good position just off the pace, chased inside on the turn, pursued the leader against the rail in upper stretch, gained to make a bid inside the furlong marker, took the lead before the sixteenth-pole and prevailed under strong urging. MAKAR brushed with a rival at the start, settled under some urging, went around the turn in the two path, was asked three wide into the stretch, chased into the final furlong then made a bid and was outfinished late while able to get the place. HATCH brushed with an opponent at the start, was urged along off the pace, went five wide on the turn, chased outside into upper stretch, had the rider lose his crop at the furlong marker and was out-kicked while up for the show. EXCESS DEMAND was hustled from the gate, contested the pace on the inside of a foe, vied in the two path on the turn, was asked at the five-sixteenths, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. KBCYA LATER chased the pace on the outside then four wide on the turn, made a bid while remaining on his inside lead in upper stretch, swapped to the proper lead inside the furlong marker and also weakened. DADS GOOD RUNNER was last to commence, moved out near the five-eighths, went three wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SARATOGA BANKER was hustled from the gate, disputed the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn, led under a drive into the final furlong then was collared and tired. M B'S MUNNING was ridden along towards the rear, saved ground on the turn, came out into the stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Moving Pictures
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fernhill Stables, LLC & Dunwoody Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: Gags Racing Stable LLC and Dini Michael

ENTRY.NAME: Dads Good Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,mvd out 5/8,3w turn,6w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Makar
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L

ENTRY.NAME: Hatch
ENTRY.OWNER: Epona Racing Stable and Toga Party Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed,urged along,5w turn,chased,lost crop1/8,up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 107. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim OtherwiseC laim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FILM STAR coaxed from the gate to establish the front, showed the way rated on the pace in the two path patiently handled through sensible splits and settled into a comfortable rhythm, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, the rider peering inside and then outside before being roused straightened away, drew clear under a drive to prevail. CONSTITUTIONLAWYER four then three wide through the first turn, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. IRON WORKS three then two wide through the first turn, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued three wide into upper stretch, kept on to procure the show honors. WILD BANKER brushed the off side stall at the start, chased two to three wide until tipped four to five wide at the three-eighths put to coaxing, went seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. SOUTHERN DISTRICT chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Southern District
ENTRY.OWNER: Abramowitz Darryl E Vitulli Peter and Cabrera Kristin

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate st, chased 2-3w, tipped 4-5w 3/8, 7w uppr, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, rated 2p, 4-5w uppr, roused, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionlawyer
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Brown Road Racing Adelphi Racing Club Hume Shelly and Hume
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w 1st turn, chased 4w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, no match, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIRAMONTE went to the front, showed the way on the inside while in hand, was given his cue on the far turn, came off the rail into the stretch, dueled inside of the runner-up to the finish and gamely prevailed. P MONEY went around the first turn in the three path, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the turn, came under the crop while three wide into the stretch, dueled outside of the winner in the drive and missed while able to get the place. SHINSUN was last to commence, angled in at the rear, saved ground at the back of the field, turned into the stretch in the two path, rallied in the final furlong and closed well to get the show. TIMBUKTU was taken in hand early, saved ground on the first turn, was reserved under restraint, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused six wide into upper stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed well to just miss the show. BARREL OF QUESTS was rated on the inside, came off the rail into upper stretch, pursued the leaders into the final furlong, gained into the final sixteenth and just missed the superfecta. BE OF COURAGE went five wide early on the first turn, dropped to the four then three path later on that bend, moved further in while towards the back, saved ground on the far turn and improved position. LACHAISE went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was asked four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed kick. MORETHANAFEELING went three wide on the first turn, settled outside while given some cover on the backstretch, traveled three wide on the far turn, was roused four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SONIC SPEED was taken under a vigorous hold early, went three wide on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, rounded the far turn in the three path, angled out while put to a drive in upper stretch and failed to impact. WHISTLER'S HONOR went three to four wide on the turns, came six wide into the stretch and also lacked the needed response. NOBLE HUNTSMAN navigated the opening bend in the two path, settled near the back, went four then five wide on the far turn and failed to threaten. BOURBON CHASE settled off the pace in the two path, was asked on the final turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Sonic Speed
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Gray Riders Stable PlayingTheField Racing and Acqua Nova St
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,3wide turns,angled out 3/16,failed to impact

ENTRY.NAME: Giramonte
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,inside pace in hand,ask2nd turn,2p1/4,dueled,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Barrel of Quests
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,came off rail into upper stretch,chased,missed super

ENTRY.NAME: Shinsun
ENTRY.OWNER: Edition Farm and Conroy Linda C
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,angled in,inside turns,2p1/4,rallied,gained,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Morethanafeeling
ENTRY.OWNER: Vintage Thoroughbreds LLC and Carguys Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Be of Courage
ENTRY.OWNER: Goodman, Gerald and Pregman, Jr., John S.

ENTRY.NAME: P Money
ENTRY.OWNER: Panda Stable Radwin Racing Stable Frezza David and Bunanta Susyrati
